name: Emperor (Petite Bryndye)
description:
You’re Emperor of romans city, receive grievances and answer it to try to make your population happy. Make your choice! ( 6 endings availables)

This game was build for the Area of effet Game Jam 2020.

Click on the left corner button to restart the game.

Made by Hugo CLUZEL (https://petite-bryndye.itch.io/),  Loïc POCHARD (https://elpochet.itch.io/), Lucas TRIGON
